segments.text: I notice the woman is just standing there, drying a plate while water pours all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so high to reach the cookie jar, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, like she doesn’t see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, and it’s only going to get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty, and the kids are going to get caught any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight is coming through the window, making everything look so normal, but it’s not.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s foot is slipping on the stool, and I can’t watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone is going to stop this before it turns into a complete mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
